Car and Light Commercial Vehicle Datasheet
patch.description:
This service enables you to update the current and annual mileage (in kilometers) of a vehicle related to a CMB.
In the case there is an existing invoice related to a CMB, the new mileage must be superior than the mileage saved before if the invoice date is inferior than the day date.
If you want to modify the current mileage related to an existing past invoice, you must use “remove invoice” service or “Cancel and replace invoice” service.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: UUID car maintenance book or your Id

tags: Car and light Commercial maintenance Book (CMB)
Car and Light Commercial Vehicle Datasheet
patch.description:
This service allows you to change the maintenance plan type of a CMB according to the usage of the véhicule. .
To determine the right maintenance plan to apply, you can use “recommended maintenance plan” service, and select the value from the following parameters
* `stricter_plan` recommended for severe conditions,
* `less_mileage_plan` or `more_mileage_plan` depending on the average mileage,
* `stricter_less_mileage_plan` or `stricter_more_mileage_plan` for both severe and average mileage conditions.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: UUID car maintenance book or your Id

post.description:
This service allows you to add external operations to a CMB. Note :
that for each operation to add the `mileage` or` maintenance_date` property must be populated.
If the mileage is not filled, it will be calculated, ditto if the date is not filled, it will be calculated.
family and category property cannot be null.

Car and light Commercial maintenance Book (CMB)
post.description:
If authentication is successful, a JWT token is returned. This token must be decoded (with Javascript/PHP/Java or other langage library) to access the payload part :


    {
        "iss": "vds-api",
        "jti": "5c66897a1c226",
        "iat": 1550223738,
        "exp": 1550223978,
        "customer_code": "VDS-API",
        "customer_api_key": "2i56phKJ81tx386VJTU1N21v8817dgOQ",
        "customer_raison_sociale": "V DATA SERVICES TEST"
    }

The **exp** field contains the expiration time of the token (timestamp).  After this time the token become invalid, so the API consumer should retrieve a new token  before expiration time.

For all the next requests to the API, these HTTP headers must be defined :
| Header | Value |
|-----|-----|
| VDS-API-KEY     | token field value of **customer_api_key**  |
| Authorization   | Bearer **token** |

To know more on JWT Token, see https://jwt.io/

get.description:
This service enables you to retrieve a version by license plate, depending on country code and account parameter, as well as the availability of the data.

**IMPORTANT** In some cases, an error code can be returned if several version id are found. You must then choose one based on additional criteria you may have on your side or select the first one assuming there is no difference.

tags: Car and light Commercial maintenance Book (CMB)
Car and Light Commercial Vehicle Datasheet
post.description:
If **manufactureDate** is not defined in the request, by default it will be assigned to **firstRegistrationDate** value.

If both **manufactureDate** and **firstRegistrationDate** are defined, **manufactureDate** must be inferior to **firstRegistrationDate**

**externalId** is your identifier. If you fill this identifier you can use it for all other services of the CMB.

Be careful, creating a car maintenance book can take up to 20 seconds. To avoid the wait you can use the **callBack** property, an object in json format will be posted to you after the complete creation of a CMB. As this property is mandatory, either you enter a valid URL, or, if you don't want to use a callback, simply enter an empty value.

If the **annualAverageMileage** property is zero then the vehicle's average annual mileage will automatically be calculated.

**Genre**  is defined by the type of vehicle: particular (VP) or light commercial (VU). This information is provided by the Vehicle Selector.
**SevereCondition** is defined by the way the vehicle is used. To do so, refer to your end-user.

**LonglifeProgram** refers to the type of the last servicing performed on the vehicle: to define the value “Y” or “N”, please refer to your end-user depending on the last servicing performed.
Both **severeCondition** and **longlifeProgram** parameters also depend on manufacturers guidelines per vehicle.


**Please** note that you must call for **method** **GET** **maintenance** **operations** immediately  after getting the information related to the car maintenance book created previously.  Otherwise, you may get error messages for some of the following services.

tags: Car and light Commercial maintenance Book (CMB)
Car and Light Commercial Vehicle Datasheet
get.description:
Past maintenance operations timeline not performed
This service provides you with the past operations not performed from the creation of a CMB. It will retrieve data related to your account parameters.
By default, we assume the vehicle has been serviced according to the official recommendations of the manufacturer. See “Add maintenance operation” service to update the history of the vehicle.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: UUID car maintenance book or your Id

parameters.name: numberMonthForTimeline
parameters.description: Number of months in the timeline

Car and Light Commercial Vehicle Datasheet
patch.description:
This service enables you to deactivate a car maintenance book. When disabling a car maintenance book, no further updating operation is possible.
See “Enable car maintenance book” service to get it back. Note that a disabled CMB will permanently be deleted 12 months after the date of deactivation.
If the maintenance book is disabled, no further update operation will be possible.

When adding an invoice, the mileage is automatically updated with the information provided.
In the case there is an existing invoice related to a CMB, the new mileage must be superior than the mileage saved before if the invoice date is prior to the present date.
If you want to modify the current mileage related to an existing past invoice, you must use **remove invoice** service or **Cancel and replace invoice** service.

get.description:
This service allows to retrieve information related to an identified vehicle and organized by data blocks: "standard", "description", "general","technical", "administrative","connectivity”, “rims and tires”.

Vehicle datasheet is available by Version Id if you have previously identified the vehicle using Brands/models/versions directory or by license Plate. In the case the service “version_by_plate” returns several version Ids, you must then use both “VersionId + licensePlate” as mandatory parameters to retrieve the vehicle datasheet.
